thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: VV122Y

author: VV122Y
title: VV122Y
text:
*Have most of the items I need at a reasonable price
*Ships orders ASAP even if free shipping
*Order splitting can be avoided by checking order list created during checkout and removing items you don't really need and/or pick other items that will not get splitted
*Customer service is helpful and responsive
*Credibility is evident for the reason that it is accepting Paypal payments.Although item complaint can be addressed with customer service who at one time offered refund which I declined because in the end I resolved my issue it is still good to know I am also protected with Paypal
